PARAGRAPH.STRING: , officially the Republic of Ecuador ([Spanish: República del Ecuador], short form Ecuador, IPA [IPA: [re'puβlika ðel ekwa'ðoɾ]]) is a representative democratic republic in South America, bounded by Colombia on the north, by Peru on the east and south, and by the Pacific Ocean on the west.
also includes the Galápagos Islands (Archipiélago de Colón) in the Pacific, about 965 kilometers (600 miles) west of the mainland. Ecuador is the Spanish word for equator.
has an area of 256,370 square kilometers (98,985 mi²).
